title: Pirates v.s. Pummelers
short_desc: The crew gets ambushed by space pirates appearing to have ill intentions.

content.text: @Magic8Ball Are the space pirates shooting pulse lasers at our ship's thrusters?
ðŸŽ± | No, Zander.
@Magic8Ball Does Ibraxas wake?
ðŸŽ± | No, Brakia.
t!8ball Are the space pirates flying dangerously close to the ship?
ðŸŽ± | Signs point to yes, Bagelwrecker.
t!8ball Do the space pirates speak over the intercom?
ðŸŽ± | My sources say no, Zander.
Seth glares out the window, cocking his revolver.
That cunt is driving really close to us.
t!8ball Is Ibraxas awake?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, Brakia64.
t!8ball Does Emmett sloppily come out of his room?
ðŸŽ± | You may rely on it, Zander.
Ibraxas bolts up.
I'm up. What did I miss?
Emmett wakes up, still on Maia's back from the night prior. He smiles softly before the ship rumbles erratically, startling him.
What the hell is happening?
There's a cunty pilot flying close to us.
t!8ball Does Seth lean back in the captain's chair?
ðŸŽ± | Concentrate and ask again, Bagelwrecker.
Emmett takes a look at the sensors through his watch, groaning.
These guys seem really aggressive.
Probably Space Dust junkies.
Could they be angry at us?
t!8ball Does Ibraxas get his sniper in preparation for a battle?
ðŸŽ± | Concentrate and ask again, Brakia64.
It's possible.
t!8ball Does Ibraxas grab his sniper in preparation for a fight?
ðŸŽ± | My sources say no, Brakia64.
Who knows, maybe I had sex with one of their wives.
Seth smirks to himself.
t!8ball Does Ibraxas, rather, man the ship's turrets?
ðŸŽ± | Without a doubt, Zander.
Seth gets up from his captain's chair.
You mind piloting, Emmett?
I'll get the turrets.
Ibraxas heads over to the turrets, manning the console.
Emmett sighs, remembering the newscast from earlier.
Wasn't there something about us owning the Disney Diamond or something?
Seth takes out the diamond and polishes it a bit, smiling into its reflection.
Oh yeah.
Seth pockets the diamond.
Anyways use those maneuvers that I taught you Emmett.
For ship battle?
Yeah.
Maia wakes up, covered in blankets and... a fairly unclothed Emmett.
Ugh.. that alcohol put me out. How long was I asleep?
Just like 12 hours, no biggie.
Maia looks back at Emmett and smiles softly, having invited him to sleep upon her the night prior.
Oh my goodness.
Emmett rubs his eyes, yawning.
How long was I out?
Maybe a couple hours.
Those assholes are still on our left flank and they keep getting closer.
Seth slams a fist on the table nearby.
Ibraxas looks back at the hall, seeing Maia and Asier walk by.
Mornin'.
Hey.
Asier stretches dramamtically.
Oh are we being attacked!?
I think so.
No not yet.
I'm sure they're pirates though.
t!8ball Does Emmett hop off of whatever he was sleeping upon?
ðŸŽ± | Ask again later, Zander.
Jim sits up suddenly.
And then I said, "No, FUCK you E'mitt!", ... And t-then... I uh...
Jim looks around.
What's goin' on?
t!choose Emmett wakes up on the floor | His bed | His closet | Maia
ðŸ¤” | Bagelwrecker, I pick Maia!
Hello, Emmett.
Maia pets Emmett's head.
Hey Emmett, you ready to do those maneuvers yet?
Emmett shivers from the touch, his sensitive horns not helping stay composed.
Uhm... Hey.
Seth tries to maneuver the ship, but only gets shocked from the console.
Those guys are like ten meters from us!
Emmett, more focused on his desires than the situation happening around the ship, speaks softly to Maia.
This isn't awkward, is it?
No, youre okay.
Jim puts his fists on his hips.
Fuukin' space pi'rets, am I right?
Meh, they probably want this jewel.
Seth flips the jewel in his pocket.
t!8ball Does Ibraxas check the damage?
ðŸŽ± | Without a doubt, Brakia.
Emmett snaps back to reality, realizing the space pirates are a bit more important.
I'm going to check what's going on.
Emmett slips off of Maia's back and puts on some clothing.
Has anyone established a proper connection with the other ship?
Seth still tries to finagle with the console.
Space link's down.
Your back is mighty comfortable.
Emmett pats Maia's back before heading to the cockpit.
Asier pops his head into the cockpit.
Is it hostile?
We're in deepspace.
Thank you!
Well, I would have woken up to something else if they shot.
They'll need to get closer to us if they want to initiate contact with us.
Seth, would you like me to put a protective shield around the ship?
t!8ball Does Ibraxas use his expert skills to fix communications?
ðŸŽ± | Ask again later, PlasmaQueso.
I wouldn't mind that.
Show me where the cannons are, we do have defensive cannons on this thing, right?
No.
This is a residential ship for right now.
Is there any way I can get a shot outside the ship?
We might have a turret or two.
Space walk.
t!8ball Does Maia put a shield around the ship?
ðŸŽ± | My reply is no, Mica.
I might need to strap in.
Jim walks over to the turrets.
Maia holds her arms out, her attempt at creating a protective bubble only causing a fizz within her fingertips.
My magic doesnt seem to be working...
Ibraxas takes out some faulty wiring of the ship's comms systemm and replaces it.
Comms are fixed.
t!8ball Does Seth go and grab him engraved laser pistol.
ðŸŽ± | My reply is no, Bagelwrecker.
Are we getting a message?
t!8ball Does Jim go and find a space suit?
ðŸŽ± | Most likely, TheBlade.
The comms are working, just space link doesn't reach this far in space.
Jim puts on a spacesuit.
Guys, where's my plasma crossbow?
We're in deep space.
Anyone got a rifle lying around?
Jim was looking through the weapons on the table that Seth assembled together.
With a scope if you have it?
t!8ball Does Emmett find his crossbow and put on his goggles?
ðŸŽ± | As I see it, yes, Zander.
Emmett looks out the window, judging the distance between the two ships with his goggles.
They're approximately five meters from us.
Dang. We'll need to put 'Better Space Link' on the wish list.
I think I should go somewhere safe...
Maia started backing away from the others.
Asier looks annoyed.
Why don't we already have one of those?
We don't go into deep space all that often anyways.
t!choose Scoped Lazer Rifle | Harpoon | handlazer | holy hand grenade | 3 in. Lightsaber
ðŸ¤” | TheBlade, I pick 3 in. Lightsaber!
I think we'll be fine, Maia.
Jim sits at the hatch.
Well, I have to get real close if we plan to attack.
Might need to shoot a warning shot or two.
Okay... If things get bad, just tell me and I will try my magic again.
Maia sits down, trying to calm herself.
We're absolutely safe. You got Emmett, Jim, and I to keep you safe.
Thank you...
Maia starts to get a bit emotional.
Get the comms up while I get outside, ganna' get a closer look at it.
Comms are up, just stay close to the ship.
t!8ball Does Lodas contact the heretic crew's ship?
ðŸŽ± | Ask again later, Mr.WobblyShark.
t!roll d20
ðŸŽ± | Rolling a d20... Rolled a 2, Zander!
Jim opens the airlock, prepared to exit the ship.
Jim, make sure your tether is tightly locked on.
We've had a few problems with it recently.
Got it...
Jim looks around, seeing a red and green tube connected to his suit.
Uh, which one is the tether again, the green or red?
t!8ball Does Ibraxas grab his toolkit from his room?
ðŸŽ± | Without a doubt, Brakia.
Green, I think.
Should I space walk out there?
Seth, without even thinking, immediately interjected, trying to be contrarian despite Emmett's knowledge of ships.
No it's red.
With his toolbox in hand, Ibraxas heads towards the engine room.
I'll be right back. I need to grab something.
Okay, got it.
Jim releases and re-attaches the green cable to his suit, fastening it.
t!8ball Does Asier and Jim go to meet the other ship via spacewalk?
ðŸŽ± | Without a doubt, PlasmaQueso.
Is there anything you need me to do?
Asier clearly wasn't paying attention, given that Jim was already at the airlock.
Who's going with me?
The other ship aims its weapons and starts to shoot wildly at the crew's ship.
They're hostile!
Oh!
Shit..!
Maia covers her face with her hands and wings.
Seth starts to push Emmett towards the cockpit.
Emmett, do Evasive Maneuver 21!
Let me get over there.
Jim exits the airlock and walks outside of the ship
Okay, I see the other ship.
Asier exits with Jim.
Let's board their ship before they notice.
Wait, what did you bring with you?
t!8ball Does Emmett do Evasive Maneuver 21?
ðŸŽ± | It is decidedly so, Bagelwrecker.
From the evasive maneuver, Jim and Asier get jostled around.
AAAAAAH!
t!8ball Does the green cable keep Jim safe?
ðŸŽ± | As I see it, yes, TheBlade.
I had to be a little cautious with that one...
Ibraxas immediately grabs onto the railing in the engine room.
JESUS!!
STOP THE EVASIVE MANEUVER!!!
t!8ball Does Emmett stop?
ðŸŽ± | As I see it, yes, Zander.
Seth takes a big swig of rum and overhears the screaming through his comms.
GOD DAMNIT EMMETT, YOU FUCKING AMATEUR!
YOU ALMOST KILLED THOSE GUYS!
WHAT THE F---
Jim Flies a few feet into space.
Well, so much for entering with stealth.
Emmett angrily glares at Seth, who usually didn't care about anyone else in the crew.
Are you fucking drunk, Seth?
Seth laughs heartily.
Of course.
You nitwit.
Maia facepalms.
Jim tugs on his tether incessantly.
Pull me back, PULL ME BACK!
I work better in a fight when I'm drunk.
Emmett looks back, slightly in a panic.
Do we have any turrets?
We probably do.
Ibraxas rolls his eyes and mutters sarcastically.
No, we spent all our money on booze.
Garrick finally joins the fray.
Hey, whatd I miss-
Oh.
We're getting attacked by pirates.
Seth points to a button on the main console.
Click the red button with the laser rifle on it.
Jim shakes his head and changes his mind about wanting to head back to the ship. He points at the pirates' ship.
We need to get on board that ship, Asier.
Asier's at the crew's ship airlock, scratching at the door like a cat.
Please open the airlock, I want back in!
I'm scared!
Ibraxas is inspecting most the ship's defenses, seeing how they are definitely not maintained.
Our cannons are close to unusable. We haven't repaired them yet.
No, get back here, I'm not going in alone.
Asier reluctantly flies back to Jim.
Fine. I'll use my swords to cut inside...
Maia is shivering in the cockpit, having moved there to be with Seth and Emmett.
I'm scared..
Or the door.
Emmett holds out his hoof.
Maia, hold my hoof.
Garrick, mistaking fiction for reality, believes that Maia holding Emmett's hoof would cause some catastrophic event.
Don't do that!
Jim and Aiser look for a way into the pirates' ship.
Maia holds his cloven hoof with her soft human hand.
Can't we just let them in?
We don't need to breathe.
Jim tries to speak louder into his watch by bringing it closer to his face despite being in a spacesuit.
May I remind you, most of us NEED OX-E-GEN!
Garrick, I have a feeling that you don't know about me.
Or Seth.
Garick puts a hand to his face in thought and looks back at Emmett.
Good point.
Or literally anyone else on this ship.
t!8ball Does Ibraxas check the status of the shitty cannons?
ðŸŽ± | Reply hazy try again, Brakia.
Seth flicks his own ear.
I miss the elf oxygen.
t!8ball Does Jim and Asier Find a door?
ðŸŽ± | Outlook not so good, TheBlade.
Does anyone see a way inside?
t!8ball Do the pirates open fire on Jim and cripple his right arm?
ðŸŽ± | Outlook not so good, Mr.WobblyShark.
The pirates start to take shots at Jim, having found him.
THEY FOUND ME!
Jim attempts to dodge, kicking himself off the side of the pirate ship.
FUCK, FUCK, FUCK, FUCK, FUCK ME!
Hey Emmett, remember that cool thing I taught you?
The one where we ram the ship?
Emmett pinches his snout in annoyance at Jim getting caught.
Jim, you have a tiny dagger.
t!8ball Does Maia randomly start crying purple sparkly streams of tears?
ðŸŽ± | Very doubtful, Mica.
Jim attempts to get back to the pirate ship amidst the gunfire.
Well, we now know where the door is!
Garrick takes out a toy spaceship from his pocket and plays with it, flying it around with his hand.
Space is scary and spooky.
Jim did not get that Emmett was insulting him.
I also got my shotgun, but didnt think I would need it.
You'll be okay, Maia.
Garrick starts making a mooing sound while flying the toy spaceship.
M.
I hope we will make it out of this quarrel.
t!8ball Does Seth go outside to help with the attack?
ðŸŽ± | Outlook good, Bagelwrecker.
Seth quickly grabs a spacesuit and exits the ship, meeting up with the others who were behind cover.
Alright boys, I'm here.
Get down, They got guns!
I can get down.
Seth does a Michael Jackson-inspired dance.
Alright guys, I'm going to ram you all into the pirate ship.
IM ON THE SHIP!
Sounds good, Emmett.
Do it.
Seth air humps, dodging bullets at the same time.
NO, NOT GOOD!
BACK OFF!
What the HELL, man!?
No, very good.
Aim for the fuckin' cannons man.
Emmett sighs.
It's the best idea. Otherwise the ship is going to be screwed.
Whats happening out there???
As long as we don't die, everything should be totally fine.
Garrick pockets the toy spaceship.
Along with the diamond.
Jim moves about the ship, trying desparely to get on.
Give me more time, I'll find a way in!
t!8ball Does Garrick stand around idly?
ðŸŽ± | Ask again later, RPretribution.
I put the diamond in my laser pistol, I'm using it as a laser conductor for the time being.
Seth taps the diamond in his laser pistol.
Asier draws his swords.
I'll try and draw fire, I can shapeshift to avoid most of the bullets.
Aren't you a ghost?
Jim, get inside the ship!
Asier holds his hand out for Jim.
Gotcha'.
Jim takes Asier's hand and makes it back on the ship.
Go and fly into their ship and possess something.
Emmett shrugs, and prepares to ram.
t!8ball Does Emmett execute Ship Maneuver 66?
ðŸŽ± | It is decidedly so, Zander.
t!8ball Does Jim get hit while working his way in?
ðŸŽ± | As I see it, yes, TheBlade.
The sudden rumble from the ship ramming the pirate ship causes everyone to tremble. Seth stays grounded, rotating his body around drunkenly.
WOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!
Hold on!
This is fun, isn't it Jim?
Seth looks back at Jim, who was struck by the ship rammming.
Jim!
Asier helps Jim onto the pirates' ship.
Maia holds onto the wall, terrified.
WOAH!!!
t!choose Right arm damage | Left arm damage | Right leg damage | Left leg damage | Head damage | Body damage
ðŸ¤” | TheBlade, I pick Head damage!
Ibraxas looks out the window, seeing Jim.
JIM!
FUCK MY EYE!
Jim holds his bionic eye in pain, it being crushed in the ramming.
You'll live.
JESUS CHRIST!!
Alright, time to go!
Asier runs on in, blades drawn and ready.
Jim is isnide, but injured.
Board into the breached ship, Lets go and help Jim.
Emmett gets up from the pilot's seat and heads over to Maia, who was still trembling.
Maia, do you want to board their ship?
Asier, you got medical training?
Maia furrows her brow at the idea of entering the pirates' ship.
What!? Absolutely NOT!!!
DONT TOUCH ME, the helmet is cracked!
Lodas comes out with a flag and poses heroically, rallying the rest of his men to attack the crew.
None shall escape prosecution of the Blood Angels Chapter!
Go inside then.
I'll keep care here then. I'm sure they got it.
Emmett makes some chocolate milk (or an equivalent) from the kitchen and brings it back to Maia.
I, on the other hand, will try to comfort.
t!8ball Does the crew board the enemy ship?
ðŸŽ± | It is decidedly so, Brakia.
_Jim Uses right arm to apply pressure to the hole in the pirates' ship._
Grab your weapons, we're raiding a ship!
t!8ball Does the crew charge against the pirates?
ðŸŽ± | Concentrate and ask again, PlasmaQueso.
MY FUCKING EYE!
Jim cradles his eye in pain.
AAAAHHH!
Sorry Emmett, I got the diamond in my laser pistol which is what I have with me.
t!8ball Please!
ðŸŽ± | Yes, PlasmaQueso.
CHAAAAARGE!
Oh no no no... I am scared.. there's so much yelling and agony and anger... I cant take this.
Maia drinks the chocolate milk.
I'm not angry, I'm pretty in bliss!
Seth shoots out a couple of pirates.
Be safe everyone, please...
Jim decides to flee back to the crew's ship, needing to fix his eye.
_Emmett starts to hold one of Maia's wings out of comfort._
Of course Maia, I'm always safe.
Seth winks in the midst of the chaos.
Relax. You're in safe hands.
t!8ball Does Lodas activate the tractor beam and 'immonilizers' on the heretical ship?
ðŸŽ± | Don't count on it, Mr.WobblyShark.
Or hooves. Arms. Whatever.
Maia blushes a little and smiles softly.
Lets see if my magic is working now.
t!8ball Does Maia place a magical bullet proof bubble around each of the crew members?
ðŸŽ± | Outlook not so good, Mica.
Blast!! My magic is down...
t!8ball Does Seth kick a door down?
ðŸŽ± | Better not tell you now, Bagelwrecker.
Asier slices at the enemy.
t!8ball Does Emmett press a button on the control panel, activating the oxygen generator for the ship?
ðŸŽ± | Signs point to yes, Zander.
Let's open up some windows.
Okay.
There's a lot of debris here.
Emmett points at a magazine of a scantily clad goat woman.
Hey look! It's one of Seth's smut mags!
Shiiiiiiiit...
t!8ball Does Ibraxas get lucky and puncture the terminator armour?
ðŸŽ± | Ask again later, Brakia.
Get those back in my room please.
Seth continues to shoot at the pirates.
t!8ball Does Ibraxas get lucky and puncture the terminator armour?
ðŸŽ± | It is decidedly so, Brakia.
Emmett shoots at a magazine.
Oops.
Thanks, there goes your birthday present.
Are there seatbelts on this ship?
Maia is starting to feel woozy.
It was a goat smut mag.
Emmett snaps back.
There goes your access to my grass.
t!choose Shoot head | Shoot chest | Shoot arm | Shoot leg
ðŸ¤” | Brakia, I pick Shoot chest!
Nice!
Direct shot. Nice.
I mean, I could be your seatbelt.
Emmett wiggles his eyebrows suggestively.
On a more serious note, we have some.
t!8ball Does Asier use his first seen instance of light magic to make the terminator fall over?
ðŸŽ± | Don't count on it, PlasmaQueso.
Maia did not get Emmett's innuendo.
You are pretty small, Emmett. I am part horse after all.
Ugh, I need more practice with this crap.
I'm sure he could hold you down.
I'm not moving this ship until we're done here, Maia.
I will keep my mouth shut then..
t!8ball Does Lodas grab his heavy flamer and chainsword and order robobears, Yogi and Booboo, to chase down the filthy heretic for puncturing his armor?
ðŸŽ± | Concentrate and ask again, Mr.WobblyShark.
t!8ball Does Maia go to her room?
ðŸŽ± | Without a doubt, Mica.
t!8ball Does the space marine use his own dildo as a weapon?
ðŸŽ± | My sources say no, Bagelwrecker.
t!8ball Does Lodas grab his heavy flamer and chainsword and order robobears, Yogi and Booboo, to chase down the filthy heretic for puncturing his armor?
ðŸŽ± | Concentrate and ask again, Mr.WobblyShark.
I'll be in my room.
Garrick flies over to the pirate ship with a mint-flavored juicebox and a rocket-propelled sledgehammer in the other hand.
Sup' nerds what did I miss?
Asier's eyes boggle out of his head for a split second, surprised by the crazy weapon in Garrick's possession.
WHERE DID YOU GET THAT HAMMER?!
I don't know, I just found it on the ground.
Garrick "shrugs".
Emmett waves at Maia.
Alright!
Garrick takes out some lint from his pocket and throws it at a pirate.
Nice!
Maia, without realizing that her comms were still on, vocalizes her diary entry.
Dear Diary, why am I so emotional?
Should I bring out a weapon or something?
Garrick tosses the sledgehammer into his pockets and digs for something he would consider a weapon.
t!choose Gun | Hammer | Gun again
ðŸ¤” | RPretribution, I pick Gun again!
Garrick takes out a glock.
Nice.
Oh, okay.
Jim takes out his eye implant, figuring the time to fix it would take way too long this episode.
Two pistols then.
Garrick takes out another glock.
Nice, I found two pistols.
Today's my lucky day.
Emmett aims his plasma crossbow at the opposing ship's thrusters.
I WANT ALL OF YOU DAMN FILTHY HERETICS OFF MY SHIP NOW!
Emmett continues to aim, swaying his hips in anticipation.
No!
Jim finds his way back on the pirate ship.
Garrick points a glock at Lodas.
Lodas stomps angrily, repeating himself.
I WANT ALL OF YOU DAMN FILTHY HERETICS OFF MY SHIP NOW!
No!
Too bad.
Garrick frowns.
Aw, but thats no fun.
Since Jim no longer has a robo-eye, he has twice the chance of missing attacks.
Lalalalalalalalalallalalalala!
Emmett charges up the crossbow.
IN THE NAME OF THE HOLY GOD EMPEROR I SHALL SMITE YOU WITH RITCHEOUS FURY! FOR WE ARE THE EMPEROR'S WRATH!!!
Lodas waves a shotgun in the air angrily.
Asier picks up a slice of cheese and eats it, speaking while chewing.
No u!
You attacked us.
I'm back for my eye, you gigantic space bastard!
Jim, back in the pirate ship, cocks his shotgun, a passion to kill the space marine burning within him.
Blah, blah, blah, I'm gay. That is all I heard from you, gay boy.
Seth turns around and moons Lodas before pulling his pants back up.
Oh dang, Jim's getting real!
Yeah! Kick his ass, Jim!
I bet your emperor shoves his cock up your ass everyday.
Seth sticks a finger through his index and thumb on his other hand suggestively.
t!8ball Does Garrick start shooting at the guy aimlessly?
ðŸŽ± | As I see it, yes, RPretribution.
t!8ball Does Emmett shoot the thrusters multiple times?
ðŸŽ± | Outlook not so good, Zander.
I dont really know how to use these, so let me know if I hit you.
Garrick starts to shoot at Lodas, missing most of his shoits.
The crossbow misses its charged shot and displays an "OUT OF AMMO" message on its interface.
Oopsies, out of ammo.
Gotta recharge.
Emmett heads back to the lounge to grab another energy pack.
t!8ball Does Ibraxas puncture the armour again?
ðŸŽ± | It is decidedly so, Brakia.
Another direct shot!
Ibraxas pumps his fist excitedly.
Your emperor is gay and you should suck your own ass.
Seth sticks his tongue out mockingly.
t!choose Shoot head | Shoot chest | Shoot arm | Shoot leg | Shoot in the penis
ðŸ¤” | Brakia, I pick Shoot head!
Holy crap, a headshot!
Nice job... you.
Garrick's finger points at Ibraxas, slightly growing larger.
I forgot your name.
Lodas feels his helmet and cracks his fingers, furious.
YOU GOD DAMN HERETIC, YOU SHALL SUFFER AS A SERVITOR FOR CENTURIES!
It's Ibraxas.
Oh, got it.
Fuck you, sleazeball!
Got it memorized, you crazed cultist?
Lodas tosses away his shotgun and grabs a minigun.
COME HERE AND SAY IT TO ME!
Your emperor is also a sleazeball.
I'll gas him.
Seth takes out his watch and plays a fart sound effect from it.
What are you, a transformer or something?
Garrick looks confused about what's happening.
Oh, I'mma' say something in a minute to you!
Jim starts fighting Yogi and Booboo simultaneously.
t!8ball Does Asier repeatedly punch the enemy but to no avail?
ðŸŽ± | Outlook good, PlasmaQueso!
MAYBE THAT'S WHY WE'RE ALL BUFF!
Lodas flexes.
CRAP HIS ARMOR IS TOO STRONG!
Garrick takes out a post-it note with rainbow highlighter stripes on it. He sticks it on Asier's back when he wasn't looking.
Dude, you look gay.
Ibraxas shrugs.
Because you're a cultist?
Hey guys, I got my ammo.
It is time to shoot the cockpit.
What?
Asier grabs the post-it note, confused.
Alongside the funny control panel.
I'll gas him like I did with those filthy fucking Waterelves.
Seth slaps his ass.
t!8ball Does Lodas burn the filthy heretics with his heavy flamer incapacitating them?
ðŸŽ± | Don't count on it, Mr.WobblyShark.
t!8ball Does the spacemarine brandish a fleshlight?
ðŸŽ± | Without a doubt, Bagelwrecker.
Lodas's face becomes very wide, imitating the following ascii art face: "------\***\*\_\*\***-------".
Nice fleshlight, sleazeball.
t!8ball Is the fleshlight large enough to fit Seth's head inside?
ðŸŽ± | Without a doubt, Zander.
... Do you just keep that on you?
Garrick sticks out his tongue apathetically.
Is... is he holding a Fleshlightâ„¢ï¸? Eww.
Ibraxas sticks out his tongue in disgust.
t!8ball Does Jim make a mad dash for Lodas and stab him in the eye with the lightsaber?
ðŸŽ± | Signs point to yes, TheBlade.
IT WAS PLANTED THERE BY THIS SLINESSHII WORSHIPING HERETIC!
Lodas shoots a techpriest before being assaulted by Jim. He slaps Jim away from him.
Jim jumps back in a bit of rage.
AN EYE FOR AN EYE!
Jim beats his chest like Tarzan.
MOTHER FUCKER!
Asier smiles like Jerma.
Pun.
Get Stabbed, BEEAATCH!
WOOOOO! Nice job, Tim!
Garrick waves excitedly.
Hey, guys?
Guys.
Hey space marine, my gods are better and actually exist.
Seth mockingly takes out two fingers and sticks his tongue through them.
Yeah?
WOAH YES THAT FEELS-
... Wait, did you just call me "Tim"?
Uh... is that not your name?
Its Jim...
Garrick shrugs.
Oh... sorry.
Emmett looks through his holodevice to confirm his suspicions.
I think you're killing an innocent man.
Asier slaps Garrick.
Hey Garlic!
You just ruined my badassery...
Jim frowns in shame.
You're next!
